nodes.text: The Fangs of the Hutt were a criminal gang that operated on the desert planet Ponemah Terminal, utilizing heavy speeders. They were one of the many criminal groups on Ponemah who attempted to track down supposed lost treasure aboard the crashed Separatist cruiser Obrexta III, managing to board the vessel first. However, the Fangs of the Hutt were unaware that the ship's core had been leaking toxic durilliam gas, and all perished upon entering the wreck.
